long_description: The Coleman Large Sport Collapsible Cooler holds a full day's worth of food or 75 cans. It collapses down to the thickness of a phone book so it won't take up much space when not in use. Zippered closure with an integrated bottle opener ensures you're always ready to enjoy a cold drink. For dry goods, the front mesh pocket lets you carry more items while saving room in the main compartment. After you've packed this cooler full, the 2 side handles make it easy to carry. Antimicrobial properties are built into the flexible lining to resist odor, mold and mildew, making it easy to clean between uses. 4 molded cup holders on top keep drinks close. The Coleman Large Sport Collapsible Cooler has heat-welded seams that help prevent leaks.
short_description: The Coleman Large Sport Collapsible Cooler holds a full day's worth of food or 75 cans. It collapses down to the thickness of a phone book so it won't take up much space when not in use.
